item.title: Keybindings strategies in Emacs
item.description: Emacs is all keybindings. Escape Meta Alt Control Shift as they say. When you add another layer of possible keybindings with Evil, you end up being pretty limitless in your keybindings choices. Here I want to describe how I bind keys in Emacs. I do this for two reasons: because writing helps me to formalise it, and to get feedbacks from you and your own keybindings strategies. The outline is the following.
